    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:T175_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>T175_2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">ICTs in everyday life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ICTs in der täglichen Lebensdauer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ICTs dans la vie quotidienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ICTs na vida diária</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ICTs nella vita di tutti i giorni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ICTs στην καθημερινή ζωή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ICTs en vida diaria</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">We now live in a global village where distance in no longer a barrier to commercial or social contact. This unit will enable you to gain an understanding of the information and communication technologies that drive our networked world and how they now permeate our everyday lives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">IT and Computing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Information</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Networked_life</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Networked_society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Technologies</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir jetzt in einem globalen Dorf in dem Abstand 
in nicht mehr einer Sperre zum kommerziellen oder Sozialkontakt leben.
Diese Maßeinheit aktiviert Sie, zu gewinnen ein Verständnis 
der Informations- und Kommunikationstechniken, die unsere vernetzte 
Welt antreiben und wie sie jetzt unsere täglichen Lebensdauern 
durchdringen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous vivons maintenant dans un village global où
distance dans plus une barrière au contact commercial ou social. 
Cette unité vous permettra de gagner un arrangement des 
technologies de l'information et de transmission qui pilotent notre 
monde géré en réseau et de la façon dont ils imprègnent 
maintenant nos vies journalières.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós vivemos agora em uma vila global onde 
distância não mais por muito tempo em uma barreira ao contato 
comercial ou social. Esta unidade permiti-lo-á de ganhar uma 
compreensão das tecnologias de informação e de comunicação que 
dirigem nosso mundo networked e de como permeate agora nossas vidas 
diárias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ora viviamo in un villaggio globale in cui 
distanza più in una barriera al contatto commerciale o sociale. 
Questa unità vi permetterà di guadagnare una comprensione 
delle tecnologie di comunicazione e delle informazioni che guidano il 
nostro mondo networked e di come ora pervadono le nostre vite 
giornalieri.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεν ζούμε τώρα σε ένα σφαιρικό χωριό όπου απόσταση 
πλέον σε ένα εμπόδιο στην εμπορική ή κοινωνική επαφή. 
Αυτή η μονάδα θα επιτρέψει σε σας για να κερδίσει μια 
κατανόηση των τεχνολογιών ενημέρωσης και επικοινωνιών που οδηγούν
το δικτυωμένο κόσμο μας και πώς διαπερνούν τώρα τις καθημερινές 
ζωές μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ahora vivimos en una aldea global en donde 
distancia en no más de largo una barrera al contacto comercial o 
social. Esta unidad le permitirá ganar una comprensión de las 
tecnologías de información y de comunicación que conducen nuestro 
mundo networked y de cómo ahora impregnan nuestras vidas diarias.</string>
          </description>
